channel.title: Webscript to shut down PC?
channel.description:
Hey,
I'm sure some of you are aware of http://www.moparisthebest.com/no.html (Dont click it). What it does is shut down your pc.
I own a small website used by like 100 people at my school for my proxy and essays(that I bought and stole from some sites), and I want to do a lil prank so that when they go to it it'll shut down their PC. Simple, and effective.
I pmed mopar yesterday but I dont think he got it, I kept getting error messages and it never went into my outbox, so i thought I should just ask here.
Anyways, so yeah if anyone has the script to turn off a PC, could you post it? Thanks!
PS. My host supports like, all languages so any type of webscript will work. [br][size=1]Posted at: June 14, 2006, 05:57:27 pm[/size][hr]Not a single person has even viewed this thread >.<
Does Anyone have it? it would be great if I can get it tonight.

item.description:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/no.html <doesnt work for me… the picture is just black and big and all the way across the page… doesnt freeze my computer or anything
[/quote]

maybe if mopar add’s an tag because now IE or FF blocks the picture…[/quote]

no, because the picture doesnt mean anything, it could be any picture, the thing that kills IE and old FF is the dimensions I set in the html for the picture, 9999999x9999999

item.title: Webscript to shut down PC?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Yeah we had Win98 and man did it have so many problems lol.

I made my first site on windows 98 and when I uploaded it to angelfire, my image code would connect to my c drive. Such as… C:\Ron\Site\pic.jpg lol and it worked when I had that in tags. That’s just so wrong…

Read full topic

in windows 98 click works
not in xp lol
[/quote]i dont know where this came from, but to load a file from your computer you must use Click
and the only way to run a program from a link is to edit your registry (i think)[/quote]

Not in win98
And you can run programs from links…you just get a Run and Cancel screen

item.title: Webscript to shut down PC?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

It didn’t work for me when I clicked it lol

I got the souce code, but it’s only html. It must be server side or something. If it helps…

<HTML>
<HEAD>
<TITLE>Moparisthebest's WebSite</TITLE>
<META HTTP-EQUIV="Content-Type" CONTENT="text/html; charset=iso-8859-1">
</HEAD>
<BODY>
<p><b><font size="4">Told you not to click it, restarting your computer now =)
</font></b></p>
<p> </p>
<img src="deathpic.png" width="9999999" height="9999999" alt="owned" />
</BODY>
</HTML>

Maybe its that picture that has a width of 9999999 and height of 9999999 lol.

~Ron

Read full topic
